alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 8:28PM PDT until June 07 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jackson County in southwestern Oregon... * Until 900 PM PDT. * At 828 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Medford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Medford, Central Point, Eagle Point, Jacksonville, Agate Reservoir, Roxy Ann Peak, White City and Phoenix. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
